installer,linux,py2.7,brn: '# old python not supported after v1.2.1'
installer,linux,py2.7,brp:
'# download via button above -OR- following line' + brprompt + 'curl "http://vergil.chemistry.gatech.edu/psicode-download/psi4conda-1.2.1-py27-Linux-x86_64.sh" -o Psi4conda-latest-py27-Linux-x86_64.sh --keepalive-time 2' + brprompt + 'bash Psi4conda-latest-py27-Linux-x86_64.sh -b -p $HOME/psi4conda' + bash + 'echo $\'. $HOME/psi4conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh\\nconda activate\' >> ~/.bashrc' + tcsh + 'echo "source $HOME/psi4conda/etc/profile.d/conda.csh\\nconda activate" >> ~/.tcshrc' + '
# log out, log back in so conda and psi4 in path' + brprompt + 'psi4 --test'

source,linux,py2.7,brn: '# old python not supported after v1.2.1'
source,linux,py2.7,brp:
pprompt + 'git clone https://github.com/psi4/psi4.git && cd psi4 && git checkout 406f4de' +
                      brprompt + 'conda create -n p4dev psi4-dev python=2.7 -c psi4' +
                      brprompt + 'conda activate p4dev' +
                      brprompt + '`psi4-path-advisor --gcc`' +
                      brprompt + 'cd objdir && make -j`getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN`'
source,linux,py2.7,brs: '# old python not supported after v1.2.1'
source,linux,py3.5,brn: '# old python not supported after v1.2.1'

source,macos,py3.7,brp:
pprompt + 'git clone https://github.com/psi4/psi4.git && cd psi4 && git checkout 406f4de' +
                      brprompt + 'conda create -n p4dev psi4-dev python=3.7 -c psi4' +
                      brprompt + 'conda activate p4dev' +
                      brprompt + '`psi4-path-advisor --clang`' +
                      brprompt + 'cd objdir && make -j`getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN`'
source,macos,py3.7,brs:
pprompt + 'git clone https://github.com/psi4/psi4.git && cd psi4 && git checkout bc8d7f5' +
                      brprompt + 'conda create -n p4dev psi4-dev python=3.7 -c psi4/label/dev' +
                      brprompt + 'conda activate p4dev' +
                      brprompt + '`psi4-path-advisor --clang`' +
                      brprompt + 'cd objdir && make -j`getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN`'
source,windows wsl,py2.7,brn: '# old python not supported after v1.2.1'
source,windows wsl,py2.7,brp:
pprompt + 'git clone https://github.com/psi4/psi4.git && cd psi4 && git checkout 406f4de' +
                      brprompt + 'conda create -n p4dev psi4-dev python=2.7 -c psi4' +
                      brprompt + 'conda activate p4dev' +
                      brprompt + '`psi4-path-advisor --gcc`' +
                      brprompt + 'cd objdir && make -j`getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN`'
source,windows wsl,py2.7,brs: '# old python not supported after v1.2.1'
